blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

summary: i'm not sure how to explain this but like half of the reason why i like some of dnp's old /old/ videos is b/c it shows how much...
question: i'm not sure how to explain this but like half of the reason why i like some of dnp's old /old/ videos is b/c it shows how much they've changed/grown? like there are some things they've said that they wouldn't say today but you can also see how they don't feel or act as awkward on camera ? i feel like it's more noticeable w/ phil's older videos where hes sitting on the floor and wobbles around a bit (pulling his leg up, etc) (1/2)
answer:
like they’re still a bit of awkward people b/c that’s just who they are sometimes and their older videos are a bit endearing in how young/awk they seemed but i’m glad you can see that they’ve gotten more confident in front of a camera :’) (btw dan’s “hello internet” is def really endearing to me for this reason even tho i really understand why dan cringes sm at it) (2/2)

i think that’s totally valid b? i agree completely, i think a part of why we can appreciate 2018!dnp as much as we do is because we can see where they came from, how they were in their early vids. and it is actually quite endearing? i mean we call them fetus!phan but like. it’s exactly like looking back at baby pictures? and going “aww how cute, and look how much they’ve grown/changed!”

baby pics

and then our modern lads

anyway yes hi i’m soft and in love with them and their growth????

blog.name: winniethehowell
blog.title: Dan Is Literally A Teddy Bear
blog.description: Dee. 18. She/Her. Is hardcore believer Dan is a Pooh bear and Phil is Tigger

body:
“Just Friends”

Summary: Based off of Friends!

Chapter 7- The Chapter All About Cornelia

Cornelia sighed as she left work for the night, thinking about how crazy it was that Phil wasn’t with Dan. She thought they were perfect for each other and she couldn’t wrap her head around why Phil would ever be with someone other than Dan

But it made her think about her own love life. She was starting to get older and she was single. This made her stop dead in her tracks. She wasn’t married, hell, she didn’t even have a boyfriend. Was there something wrong with her? Or maybe she just was too weird to date

She sighed as she went into Starbucks to get a coffee. Although it was late at night, she knew was she going to be up all night thinking about how she wishes she had a boyfriend and probably get sad

As she went in the small Starbucks, she saw her old high school friend, Alan. “Alan?” She asked

“Cornelia?” He asked back. He was a tall, handsome man with black hair and bright, blue eyes. He has some facial hair and….. a lot of muscles

“Oh my, you look great!” She exclaimed, walking over to give him a hug. “How have you been?”

“I’ve been fine, how are you, you look beautiful.”

She paused. She was not going to answer that question because she was sad at the moment. “I’m great! It’s so good to see you, I haven’t seen you since your graduation party.”

“Yeah, my life has been mostly school.” He smiled. “It turns out it takes a long time to become an eye doctor.”

Cornelia smiled. “Well I’m going to go order my coffee but it’s great to see you.”

“Wait.” She turned back to face him at the sound of his voice. “Do you want to get lunch sometime?”

Cornelia smiled. “You mean, like a date?”

He smiled. “If you want to.”

Her smile grew. “Yeah, I’d love to.”

blog.name: knlalla
blog.title: ??¿¿?¿
blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

tags: that's honestly all i've seen recently from youtubers
summary: just something to ponder upon... how do you think other youtubers see dan and phil? i feel like most of their peers genuinely...
question: just something to ponder upon... how do you think other youtubers see dan and phil? i feel like most of their peers genuinely like them, but what do you think? what do you think they think of them? like, from different clips from different youtubers (both big and small) i get the sense that a lot of people find phil nice but dan is kind of fifty fifty sometimes (there’s that one guy who straight up thought dan was an asshole) and how do you think they think of dnp’s dynamic? x
answer:
this is really interesting honestly? because they’re such unproblematic people that like i get the vibe, like you said, that they’re well-liked. maybe revered, in a sense? bc they’re sort of up there with the most well-known youtubers and some of those who have been here the longest? like i sort of hate the word ‘legends’, but that’s kind of what they are and i think what other youtubers see them as?

here’s the thing, i’ll be totally honest, i don’t watch a lot of other youtubers, and i really don’t watch them talking about dnp - i’ve seen over the years in like older vids people mentioning dnp in that way, phil being nice and people not being as sure about dan, but we all know how much he’s changed over the years so even vids from 2015 might not be all that accurate of how other youtubers see dnp now?

honestly i think most youtubers on the same par as dnp don’t talk abt them much? like i think it’s sort of agreed at their level that they just…don’t talk abt dnp? phan specifically, but like i think most people stay away from mentioning them in anything other than a passing commentary? the smaller youtubers are where i’m not sure, and i know i’ve seen a lot of clickbait-esque vids/titles that imply they’re commenting on dnp in some way

like i watched joe & caspar’s vlogs at the uk on stage event (x) and even when they see dan it’s more like. there’s no commentary on him as a person in any way? just casual and chill?
